title: Eye of the Storm
description: Alternate cover edition of ASIN B07992M7GHDeep in the untamed wilderness of the notorious Darien Gap, a soldier wakes. Injured, he has no memory of who he is or why he is there until a beautiful woman tells him his name. But can he trust her?When Mari Dias stumbles upon Chris Shaw in the jungle—a place many risk but few survive—she ensnares his help to escape a country ruled by the very family who hunts her.As Chris and Mari search for sanctuary out of the jungle, filters of his past return in slow increments. As they grow closer, so do their enemies. Can he battle the storm that threatens them all?
author: Amy McKinley
